answers.answer: There are whole lot of foods you can eat. Ask your doctor for a referral to a diabetic nutritionist/dietitian or call your local hospital as almost all have one or more on staff. He/she will review meal plans and portion sizes with you. You can get recipe ideas on the Atkins Diet and the ADA [American Diabetes Association] web sites.

title: 6-8 meals a day?
